data.title: A bound on the multiplicative energy of a sum set and extremal sum-product problems
data.sourcetitle: Moscow Journal of Combinatorics and Number Theory
data.abstract: In recent years some near-optimal estimates have been established for certain sum-product type estimates. This paper gives some first extremal results which provide information about when these bounds may or may not be tight. The main tool is a new result which provides a nontrivial upper bound on the multiplicative energy of a sum set or difference set.
data.keywords: difference sets, finite fields, Primitive roots, Sidon sets
